Articles.Content: so i have tried everything to get ksp RVE working i have atmospheric scattering. but no clouds on venus or earth anyone have a RVE RSS install with a file that i can download with all the mods that make RVE to work i've been playing for a month now and i've never had clouds its getting on my nerves please help

Hey, yes I have RVE/SCATTERER and the whole thing installed.

Basicly you what you need to do is mess some thing around in the folder. I'll upload them for you so you can just copy my stuff. I'm now at work so keep patience for a few hours  

Also, the RVE/Scatterer thing only work on Mars and Earth.  

To be continued...

Okay here's the download link.

The things I changed in the files:

  • clouds are set to the height of 7 km.
  • scatterer folder only contains the folders Earth and Mars.
  • edited the scatterer config for Earth and Mars.

Before copying my content to your GameData, !please make sure to delete your own RVE and scatterer and also don't have EVE installed!

 

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/vex8jkbrndbuik8/KSP RSS_RO RVE and Scatteren Settings.zip?dl=0

Hope this helped you out, let me know
